abstract: It's four minutes of danger -- riding the subway outside instead of  inside -- that makes for a gripping video. The fear is it will lead to copycats.
snippet: It's four minutes of danger -- riding the subway outside instead of  inside -- that makes for a gripping video. The fear is it will lead to copycats.

headline.main: 'Subway Surfer' Becomes a Mini-Celebrity, Worrying Transit Officials
